pullRequest.body:
This PR proves various lemmas for C*-algebras, such as
- if `a ‚â§ b`, then `‚Äña‚Äñ ‚â§ ‚Äñb‚Äñ`
- `star a * b *a ‚â§ ‚Äñb‚Äñ ‚Ä¢ (star a * a)`
- if `a` is positive, then `‚Äña‚Äñ ‚àà spectrum ‚Ñù a`.

It also puts an order instance on `Unitization ‚ÑÇ A`, needed to prove the above.

- [x] depends on: #13650 
- [x] depends on: #13673 

---

PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

This PR/issue depends on:
* ~~leanprover-community/mathlib4#13650~~
* ~~leanprover-community/mathlib4#13673~~
By **[Dependent Issues](https://github.com/z0al/dependent-issues)** (ü§ñ). Happy coding!
<!-- By Dependent Issues (Action) - DO NOT REMOVE -->

In the long comment above, I think actually we want selfadjoint versions of everything. Here's what I have now. (Sorry for the complicated review; I just kept realizing things weren't quite as nice as we wanted and I knew we would want more lemmas.) Obviously not all of this goes in this file.
```lean
open ComplexOrder in
instance CstarRing.instNonnegSpectrumClassComplex {A : Type*} [NormedRing A] [CompleteSpace A]
    [PartialOrder A] [StarRing A] [StarOrderedRing A] [CstarRing A] [NormedAlgebra ‚ÑÇ A]
    [StarModule ‚ÑÇ A] : NonnegSpectrumClass ‚ÑÇ A where
  quasispectrum_nonneg_of_nonneg a ha x := by
    rw [mem_quasispectrum_iff]
    refine (Or.elim ¬∑ ge_of_eq fun hx ‚Ü¶ ?_)
    obtain ‚ü®y, hy, rfl‚ü© := (IsSelfAdjoint.of_nonneg ha).spectrumRestricts.algebraMap_image ‚ñ∏ hx
    simpa using spectrum_nonneg_of_nonneg ha hy

lemma Real.spectralRadius_mem_spectrum_or {A : Type*} [NormedRing A] [NormedAlgebra ‚Ñù A]
    [CompleteSpace A] {a : A} (ha : (spectrum ‚Ñù a).Nonempty) :
    (spectralRadius ‚Ñù a).toReal ‚àà spectrum ‚Ñù a ‚à® -(spectralRadius ‚Ñù a).toReal ‚àà spectrum ‚Ñù a := by
  obtain ‚ü®x, hx‚ÇÅ, hx‚ÇÇ‚ü© := spectrum.exists_nnnorm_eq_spectralRadius_of_nonempty ha
  simp only [‚Üê hx‚ÇÇ, ENNReal.coe_toReal, coe_nnnorm, norm_eq_abs]
  exact abs_choice x |>.imp (fun h ‚Ü¶ by rwa [h]) (fun h ‚Ü¶ by simpa [h])

lemma NNReal.spectralRadius_mem_spectrum {A : Type*} [NormedRing A] [NormedAlgebra ‚Ñù A]
    [CompleteSpace A] {a : A} (ha : (spectrum ‚Ñù a).Nonempty)
    (ha' : SpectrumRestricts a ContinuousMap.realToNNReal) :
    (spectralRadius ‚Ñù a).toNNReal ‚àà spectrum ‚Ñù‚â•0 a := by
  rw [‚Üê spectrum.algebraMap_mem_iff ‚Ñù, NNReal.algebraMap_eq_coe, ‚Üê ENNReal.toReal]
  have := Real.spectralRadius_mem_spectrum_or ha
  rwa [or_iff_left_of_imp (fun h ‚Ü¶ ?_)] at this
  have : (spectralRadius ‚Ñù a).toReal ‚â§ 0 :=
    nonpos_of_neg_nonneg <| ha'.rightInvOn h ‚ñ∏ NNReal.zero_le_coe
  simpa [le_antisymm this ENNReal.toReal_nonneg] using h

lemma Real.spectralRadius_mem_spectrum {A : Type*} [NormedRing A] [NormedAlgebra ‚Ñù A]
    [CompleteSpace A] {a : A} (ha : (spectrum ‚Ñù a).Nonempty)
    (ha' : SpectrumRestricts a ContinuousMap.realToNNReal) :
    (spectralRadius ‚Ñù a).toReal ‚àà spectrum ‚Ñù a :=
  NNReal.spectralRadius_mem_spectrum ha ha'

lemma IsSelfAdjoint.toReal_spectralRadius_complex_eq_norm {a : A} (ha : IsSelfAdjoint a) :
    (spectralRadius ‚ÑÇ a).toReal = ‚Äña‚Äñ := by
  simp [ha.spectralRadius_eq_nnnorm]

lemma IsSelfAdjoint.toReal_spectralRadius_eq_norm {a : A} (ha : IsSelfAdjoint a) :
    (spectralRadius ‚Ñù a).toReal = ‚Äña‚Äñ := by
  simp [ha.spectrumRestricts.spectralRadius_eq, ha.spectralRadius_eq_nnnorm]

lemma CstarRing.norm_or_neg_norm_mem_spectrum [Nontrivial A] {a : A}
    (ha : IsSelfAdjoint a := by cfc_tac) : ‚Äña‚Äñ ‚àà spectrum ‚Ñù a ‚à® -‚Äña‚Äñ ‚àà spectrum ‚Ñù a := by
  have ha' : SpectrumRestricts a Complex.reCLM := ha.spectrumRestricts
  have := ha.toReal_spectralRadius_eq_norm
  convert Real.spectralRadius_mem_spectrum_or (ha'.image ‚ñ∏ (spectrum.nonempty a).image _)

lemma CstarRing.nnnorm_mem_spectrum_of_nonneg [Nontrivial A] {a : A} (ha : 0 ‚â§ a := by cfc_tac) :
    ‚Äña‚Äñ‚Çä ‚àà spectrum ‚Ñù‚â•0 a := by
  have : IsSelfAdjoint a := .of_nonneg ha
  convert NNReal.spectralRadius_mem_spectrum (a := a) ?_ (.nnreal_of_nonneg ha)
  ¬∑ simp [this.spectrumRestricts.spectralRadius_eq, this.spectralRadius_eq_nnnorm]
  ¬∑ exact this.spectrumRestricts.image ‚ñ∏ (spectrum.nonempty a).image _

lemma CstarRing.norm_mem_spectrum_of_nonneg [Nontrivial A] {a : A} (ha : 0 ‚â§ a := by cfc_tac) :
    ‚Äña‚Äñ ‚àà spectrum ‚Ñù a := by
  simpa using spectrum.algebraMap_mem ‚Ñù <| CstarRing.nnnorm_mem_spectrum_of_nonneg ha
```
Thanks for the extensive review, @j-loreaux ! I think I've addressed everything except for the two comments I've left open.

:v: dupuisf can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).
bors r+

Build failed (retrying...):
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9997998248/job/27635887853)

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9998578873/job/27637790674)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9998578873/job/27637790041)

Lots of simplifications. Probably for most to work you need to merge master. You may also need to add the lemmas I suggest.

I'm very happy with how this is working out. Just appealing to the `Unitization` as in normal arguments is great. Thanks for doing this work. It really justifies the design of everything we've done so far.

Thanks!

bors d+

```suggestion
* `CstarRing.norm_le_norm_of_nonneg_of_le`: in a non-unital C‚ãÜ-algebra, if `0 ‚â§ a ‚â§ b`, then
  `‚Äña‚Äñ ‚â§ ‚Äñb‚Äñ`.
```

```suggestion
  -- TODO: prove the more general result for star monomorphisms and use it here.
  rw [‚Üê sub_nonneg, ‚Üê sub_nonneg (a := b), StarOrderedRing.nonneg_iff_spectrum_nonneg (R := ‚Ñù) _,
    ‚Üê inr_sub ‚ÑÇ b a, ‚Üê Unitization.quasispectrum_eq_spectrum_inr' ‚Ñù ‚ÑÇ]
  exact StarOrderedRing.nonneg_iff_quasispectrum_nonneg _ |>.symm
```

I know it goes against intuition, but because we have `auto_param`s here, it's helpful to be able to easily supply the arguments to help Lean with elaboration, especially in `rw` and `simp`, otherwise the lemma won't work.
```suggestion
lemma inr_le_iff (a b : A) (ha : IsSelfAdjoint a := by cfc_tac)
```

Optional, but I like this proof better:
```suggestion
  by_cases ha : IsSelfAdjoint a
  ¬∑ exact inr_zero ‚ÑÇ (A := A) ‚ñ∏ inr_le_iff 0 a
  ¬∑ refine ‚ü®?_, ?_‚ü©
    all_goals refine fun h ‚Ü¶ (ha ?_).elim
    ¬∑ exact isSelfAdjoint_inr (R := ‚ÑÇ) |>.mp <| .of_nonneg h
    ¬∑ exact .of_nonneg h
```

```suggestion
  simp [‚Üê ha.spectrumRestricts.algebraMap_image]
```

With the lemma (maybe should be `@[simp]`?)
```lean
lemma _root_.NNReal.algebraMap_eq_coe : ‚áë(algebraMap ‚Ñù‚â•0 ‚Ñù) = (‚Üë) := rfl
```
this simplifies to:
```suggestion
  simp [‚Üê (SpectrumRestricts.nnreal_of_nonneg ha).algebraMap_image, Set.mem_image,
    NNReal.algebraMap_eq_coe]
```
I think it makes more sense just to add a `NonnegSpectrumClass` proof here, as a lemma, not an instance to avoid loops. That way we have access to everything that provides.
I don't understand -- we're already assuming `NonnegSpectrumClass R A`, but that only gives us one direction of the iff.
oops, sorry, I misunderstood what was happening here.
Same here.

I would be in favor of having this instance (and the non-unital version too):
```lean
open ComplexOrder in
instance CstarRing.instNonnegSpectrumClassComplex {A : Type*} [NormedRing A] [CompleteSpace A]
    [PartialOrder A] [StarRing A] [StarOrderedRing A] [CstarRing A] [NormedAlgebra ‚ÑÇ A]
    [StarModule ‚ÑÇ A] : NonnegSpectrumClass ‚ÑÇ A where
  quasispectrum_nonneg_of_nonneg a ha x := by
    rw [mem_quasispectrum_iff]
    refine (Or.elim ¬∑ ge_of_eq fun hx ‚Ü¶ ?_)
    obtain ‚ü®y, hy, rfl‚ü© := (IsSelfAdjoint.of_nonneg ha).spectrumRestricts.algebraMap_image ‚ñ∏ hx
    simpa using spectrum_nonneg_of_nonneg ha hy
```
and along with the following lemmas (which should be able to live in `Analysis.NormedSpace.Spectrum`)
```lean
lemma NNReal.spectralRadius_mem_spectrum {A : Type*} [NormedRing A] [NormedAlgebra ‚Ñù A]
    [CompleteSpace A] {a : A} (ha : (spectrum ‚Ñù a).Nonempty)
    (ha' : SpectrumRestricts a ContinuousMap.realToNNReal) :
    (spectralRadius ‚Ñù a).toNNReal ‚àà spectrum ‚Ñù‚â•0 a := by
  obtain ‚ü®x, hx‚ÇÅ, hx‚ÇÇ‚ü© := spectrum.exists_nnnorm_eq_spectralRadius_of_nonempty ha
  rw [‚Üê hx‚ÇÇ, ENNReal.toNNReal_coe, ‚Üê spectrum.algebraMap_mem_iff ‚Ñù, NNReal.algebraMap_eq_coe]
  have : 0 ‚â§ x := ha'.rightInvOn hx‚ÇÅ ‚ñ∏ NNReal.zero_le_coe
  convert hx‚ÇÅ
  simpa

lemma Real.spectralRadius_mem_spectrum {A : Type*} [NormedRing A] [NormedAlgebra ‚Ñù A]
    [CompleteSpace A] {a : A} (ha : (spectrum ‚Ñù a).Nonempty)
    (ha' : SpectrumRestricts a ContinuousMap.realToNNReal) :
    (spectralRadius ‚Ñù a).toReal ‚àà spectrum ‚Ñù a :=
  NNReal.spectralRadius_mem_spectrum ha ha'
```
we can prove the `NNReal` version first (which I argue is closer to the way a mathematician thinks of this proof):
```lean
lemma CstarRing.nnnorm_mem_spectrum_of_nonneg [Nontrivial A] {a : A} (ha : 0 ‚â§ a := by cfc_tac) :
    ‚Äña‚Äñ‚Çä ‚àà spectrum ‚Ñù‚â•0 a := by
  have : IsSelfAdjoint a := .of_nonneg ha
  convert NNReal.spectralRadius_mem_spectrum (a := a) ?_ (.nnreal_of_nonneg ha)
  ¬∑ simp [this.spectrumRestricts.spectralRadius_eq, this.spectralRadius_eq_nnnorm]
  ¬∑ exact this.spectrumRestricts.image ‚ñ∏ (spectrum.nonempty a).image _
```
at which point the proof of this becomes:
```suggestion
  simpa using spectrum.algebraMap_mem ‚Ñù <| CstarRing.nnnorm_mem_spectrum_of_nonneg ha
```

This can be inlined into the non-unital case relatively easily, as I show below.
```suggestion
```

This is not actually necessary because we are not talking about `spectrum`. It's inclusion in the earlier non-`spectrum` lemmas in the unital version could have been avoided also.
```suggestion
variable {A : Type*} [NonUnitalNormedRing A] [CompleteSpace A]
```
(Note: the reason we can still rely on `spectrum` lemmas in the proofs is that even if `A` is trivial, `Unitization ‚ÑÇ A` isn't.)

here I've just inlined the proof of the unital case
```suggestion
  suffices ‚àÄ a b : Unitization ‚ÑÇ A, 0 ‚â§ a ‚Üí a ‚â§ b ‚Üí ‚Äña‚Äñ ‚â§ ‚Äñb‚Äñ by
    have hb := ha.trans hab
    simpa [Unitization.norm_inr] using this a b (by simpa) (by rwa [Unitization.inr_le_iff a b])
  intro a b ha hab
  have hb_nonneg : 0 ‚â§ b := ha.trans hab
  have h‚ÇÇ : cfc (id : ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù) a ‚â§ cfc (fun _ => ‚Äñb‚Äñ) a := by
    calc _ = a := by rw [cfc_id ‚Ñù a]
      _ ‚â§ cfc id b := (cfc_id ‚Ñù b) ‚ñ∏ hab
      _ ‚â§ cfc (fun _ => ‚Äñb‚Äñ) b := by
          refine cfc_mono fun x hx => ?_
          calc x = ‚Äñx‚Äñ := (Real.norm_of_nonneg (spectrum_nonneg_of_nonneg hb_nonneg hx)).symm
            _ ‚â§ ‚Äñb‚Äñ := spectrum.norm_le_norm_of_mem hx
      _ = _ := by rw [cfc_const _ _, cfc_const _ _]
  rw [cfc_le_iff id (fun _ => ‚Äñb‚Äñ) a] at h‚ÇÇ
  exact h‚ÇÇ ‚Äña‚Äñ <| norm_mem_spectrum_of_nonneg ha
```

Again, we can just inline the proof of the unital case:
```suggestion
  suffices ‚àÄ a b : Unitization ‚ÑÇ A, IsSelfAdjoint b ‚Üí star a * b * a ‚â§ ‚Äñb‚Äñ ‚Ä¢ (star a * a) by
    rw [‚Üê Unitization.inr_le_iff _ _ (by aesop) ((IsSelfAdjoint.all _).smul (.star_mul_self a))]
    simpa [Unitization.norm_inr] using this a b <| hb.inr ‚ÑÇ
  intro a b hb
  calc
    star a * b * a ‚â§ star a * (algebraMap ‚Ñù (Unitization ‚ÑÇ A) ‚Äñb‚Äñ) * a :=
      conjugate_le_conjugate hb.le_algebraMap_norm_self _
    _ = ‚Äñb‚Äñ ‚Ä¢ (star a * a) := by simp [Algebra.algebraMap_eq_smul_one]
```
You should be able to get away with just `Algebra ‚Ñù A` here instead of `Algebra ‚ÑÇ A`.
This section should probably move to an earlier file. Perhaps even `Instances`
`#find_home` tells me to just leave both of them in this file; I'm not sure it's worth adding imports to earlier files just for this.
I think `#find_home` is lying to you (at least I strongly suspect it is). Did you also try `#find_home!`?

Hmm, I had no idea `#find_home` was suboptimal somehow. Anyway, so `coe_mem_spectrum_real_of_nonneg` could go in `Analysis.NormedSpace.Spectrum` if it weren't for the `cfc_tac` autoparam. Maybe it would make sense to define the tactic in a much earlier file, it's not like it actually needs the CFC to be defined.
OK, so I moved the CFC tactics to the new file`Mathlib.Tactic.ContinuousFunctionalCalculus` and moved those two lemmas to earlier files.
Can you please move this to the `Instances` file, next to the corresponding `NonnegSpectrumClass ‚Ñù A` instance?
Same here
This one can't go in `Instances` because of `Unitization.inr_nonneg_iff` (which also must stay in this file according to `#find_home`).
fair enough here.
Please add a note in a docstring pointing the `‚Ñù` version, so that people know it exists.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(CstarRing): various lemmas related to the spectral order and the CFC

```lean
  obtain ‚ü®x, hx‚ÇÅ, hx‚ÇÇ‚ü© := spectrum.exists_nnnorm_eq_spectralRadius_of_nonempty ha
  simp only [‚Üê hx‚ÇÇ, ENNReal.coe_toReal, coe_nnnorm, norm_eq_abs]
  exact abs_choice x |>.imp (fun h ‚Ü¶ by rwa [h]) (fun h ‚Ü¶ by simpa [h])

lemma NNReal.spectralRadius_mem_spectrum {A : Type*} [NormedRing A] [NormedAlgebra ‚Ñù A]
    [CompleteSpace A] {a : A} (ha : (spectrum ‚Ñù a).Nonempty)
    (ha' : SpectrumRestricts a ContinuousMap.realToNNReal) :
    (spectralRadius ‚Ñù a).toNNReal ‚àà spectrum ‚Ñù‚â•0 a := by
  rw [‚Üê spectrum.algebraMap_mem_iff ‚Ñù, NNReal.algebraMap_eq_coe, ‚Üê ENNReal.toReal]
  have := Real.spectralRadius_mem_spectrum_or ha
  rwa [or_iff_left_of_imp (fun h ‚Ü¶ ?_)] at this
  have : (spectralRadius ‚Ñù a).toReal ‚â§ 0 :=
    nonpos_of_neg_nonneg <| ha'.rightInvOn h ‚ñ∏ NNReal.zero_le_coe
  simpa [le_antisymm this ENNReal.toReal_nonneg] using h

lemma Real.spectralRadius_mem_spectrum {A : Type*} [NormedRing A] [NormedAlgebra ‚Ñù A]
    [CompleteSpace A] {a : A} (ha : (spectrum ‚Ñù a).Nonempty)
    (ha' : SpectrumRestricts a ContinuousMap.realToNNReal) :
    (spectralRadius ‚Ñù a).toReal ‚àà spectrum ‚Ñù a :=
  NNReal.spectralRadius_mem_spectrum ha ha'

lemma IsSelfAdjoint.toReal_spectralRadius_complex_eq_norm {a : A} (ha : IsSelfAdjoint a) :
    (spectralRadius ‚ÑÇ a).toReal = ‚Äña‚Äñ := by
  simp [ha.spectralRadius_eq_nnnorm]

lemma IsSelfAdjoint.toReal_spectralRadius_eq_norm {a : A} (ha : IsSelfAdjoint a) :
    (spectralRadius ‚Ñù a).toReal = ‚Äña‚Äñ := by
  simp [ha.spectrumRestricts.spectralRadius_eq, ha.spectralRadius_eq_nnnorm]

lemma CstarRing.norm_or_neg_norm_mem_spectrum [Nontrivial A] {a : A}
    (ha : IsSelfAdjoint a := by cfc_tac) : ‚Äña‚Äñ ‚àà spectrum ‚Ñù a ‚à® -‚Äña‚Äñ ‚àà spectrum ‚Ñù a := by
  have ha' : SpectrumRestricts a Complex.reCLM := ha.spectrumRestricts
  have := ha.toReal_spectralRadius_eq_norm
  convert Real.spectralRadius_mem_spectrum_or (ha'.image ‚ñ∏ (spectrum.nonempty a).image _)

lemma CstarRing.nnnorm_mem_spectrum_of_nonneg [Nontrivial A] {a : A} (ha : 0 ‚â§ a := by cfc_tac) :
    ‚Äña‚Äñ‚Çä ‚àà spectrum ‚Ñù‚â•0 a := by
  have : IsSelfAdjoint a := .of_nonneg ha
  convert NNReal.spectralRadius_mem_spectrum (a := a) ?_ (.nnreal_of_nonneg ha)
  ¬∑ simp [this.spectrumRestricts.spectralRadius_eq, this.spectralRadius_eq_nnnorm]
  ¬∑ exact this.spectrumRestricts.image ‚ñ∏ (spectrum.nonempty a).image _

lemma CstarRing.norm_mem_spectrum_of_nonneg [Nontrivial A] {a : A} (ha : 0 ‚â§ a := by cfc_tac) :
    ‚Äña‚Äñ ‚àà spectrum ‚Ñù a := by
  simpa using spectrum.algebraMap_mem ‚Ñù <| CstarRing.nnnorm_mem_spectrum_of_nonneg ha
```
